message.translation:
ImageViewer.exe [options] options: -ipath="path" Replace the ${ipath} in images, MUST be at before of "-images" -ifilter="filter" The filter with ipath auto search image, MUST be at after of "-ipath', eg.: *.png|*.jpg -images="image[|image][|...]" The image file list, splited by '|'; Will add "${ipath}" when not any path item; Will replaced ".\" with ${ipath} -db="dbfile" The msg.db file path -fid=fid The current image's fid when use '-db', or index based 0 when use '-images' -lang=[cn,en] The language, default as system -scale=[100,125,150,200] The scale, default by system DPI -help Show this help
Example: ImageViewer.exe -ipath="d:\a\b" -images="${ipath}a.png|${ipath}b.png" ImageViewer.exe -ipath="d:\a\b" -ifilter="*.jpg" ImageViewer.exe -db="d:\msg.db" ImageViewer.exe -db="d:\msg.db" -fid=234235235232423432432
Please view in the message record
